title: Pixel 3A incomming calls work OK thru vehicle . Outgoing calls - receivers cant hear me , i hearm
content: Phone works Ok in other cars . Phone works OK  everywhere until connected  thru 2018 Chevy Colorado crew cab pickup.  Phone  then works  for incomming calls  . For OUTGOING calls ; I hear receiver, but they can't hear me  . Truck works  with older non- google flip phone .
